patthana21.51:4.1: Nosaññojanaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana21.51:4.4: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:5.1: Noganthaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.51:6.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:7.1: Nooghaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noogho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.51:8.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:9.1: Noyogaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noyogo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.51:10.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:11.1: Nonīvaraṇaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.51:12.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.51:13.1: Noparāmāsaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.51:14.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
